title: Services Schema
description: Schema for validating service objects used in the data.scilifelab.se

type.description: One or more categories describing the type of service.

search_tags.description: Search keywords associated with the service.

name.description: Title or name of the service.

thumbnail.description: OPTIONAL: Path to a thumbnail image for the service.

thumbnail_border.description: OPTIONAL: Whether to display a border around the thumbnail image.

maintained_by.description: Name of the individual or organization that maintains the service.

maintained_by_url.description: OPTIONAL: Web address of the maintaining organization or individual.

support_email.description: OPTIONAL: Email address to contact for support regarding the service.

support_website.description: OPTIONAL: Website URL for service support or documentation.

support_github.description: OPTIONAL: GitHub repository URL for the service.

support_status.description: OPTIONAL: Status page URL for the service.

support_slack.description: OPTIONAL: Slack channel or workspace URL for service support.

data_source_type.description: OPTIONAL: Type of data source associated with the service.

ddls.description: OPTIONAL: Scientific area of the services that are also data sources.

disease_type.description: OPTIONAL: Disease types associated with the services that are also data sources.
